comment.author: 9998127@N06
comment._content:
This is one of two F-8s operated by NASA. This one was rebuilt with a supercritical wing, an airfoil shape quite different from the conventional wings of the time. check Wikipedia for particulars. This kind of wing was developed into commercial use. 
NASA's other F-8 was rebuilt using a spare Apollo guidance computer as a one-off Digital Fly-by-wire demonstrator. The pilot's controls told the computer what the pilot wanted, and the computer controlled the airplane.
